entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:55 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 02:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -12.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -16.8°C
Wind: ESE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning late in the morning. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
